utterance.speaker: KATE BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle!

utterance.speaker: JAVIER ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Stay back! There’s nothing you can do.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA RODGERS
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s empty. He’s not here. He’s not in the car!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You’re sure he’s not in the car?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Even with a fire that hot there’d still be a body. He’s gotta be nearby.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: You really think he –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He’s here. He has to be. We have to start a search.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We could use more men.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Sergeant. I’m Detective Beckett, NYPD. The man that was in that car is one of our own. We need to scrub every inch of this area.

utterance.speaker: SERGEANT TAGGERT
utterance.content: I’ll get my men on it.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You have search and rescue dogs?

utterance.speaker: TAGGERT
utterance.content: I’ll call them in.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I need to help them.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You’re no use to anyone dressed like that. We’ll get started here. You go change.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Come on. Let’s get you into some other clothes.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, I’ll be right back.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: All right, I’m going to search up near the road. Maybe Castle managed to bail out before the bar crashed.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: All right. We’ll start on the car, see if we can tell what happened and where he went.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: TAGGERT
utterance.content: Airbag went off. It only activates when someone’s in that seat, so your man was definitely at the wheel.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, but if he walked away, where is he and why isn’t he picking up?

utterance.speaker: TAGGERT
utterance.content: Maybe his phone’s damaged. Or he’s disoriented. I’ve seen it before. But if he left this vehicle there’s going to be tracks or a blood trail.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hey, Javi. Walk to the back of Castle’s car.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What for?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Just do it, okay? Check the passenger rear side. Tell me what you see?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It looks like it took a hit on the right side. Busted the tail light.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: That’s because Castle got bumped by another car and run off the road. I’ve got debris up here.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: All right. Call local CSU. Maybe those pieces can help us ID that car.

utterance.speaker: TAGGERT
utterance.content: Detective. I think I’ve got something. Tracks. Going from the car up to the road. Water washed part of the trail but it looks like three people.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Three people? That can’t be right.

utterance.speaker: TAGGERT
utterance.content: See the two troughs in the dirt? Made by heels from a pair of shoes.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So he was run off the road and dragged from the car? Castle got grabbed.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Had Taggert set up road blocks to stop and search every vehicle.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We figured that the car that ran Castle into the ditch may be the same car he’s in now.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did we get a description?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Not yet, but CSU thinks the side marker glass up ahead came from a GM. Local PD’s canvassing to see if anyone saw any vehicles leaving the area.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What about Castle’s cell phone?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: His provider says it’s shut off.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Contacted the FBI to see if it can be turned on remotely. It’s a long shot, but you never know.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What else?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Kate. Everything that can be done is being done.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Espo, don’t tell me that. They took him. I need to do something.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Then tell us about that phone call you got.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Was he nervous? Did he indicate in any way he was being followed?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. He was just – normal. He was normal.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey. Sergeant Taggert may have a witness. Guy runs a fruit stand up the road.

utterance.speaker: CAL HARPER
utterance.content: Yeah, I definitely saw a Mercedes go by around the time you’re talking. Uh … bronze colored.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: That’s Castle’s car.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What about any cars after that?

utterance.speaker: CAL
utterance.content: Uh. Let’s see. There was a Volkswagen Bug, a Ferrari, an SUV.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: No one’s going to run him off the road with a Bug or a Ferrari.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Talk to me about that SUV.

utterance.speaker: CAL
utterance.content: It was an Escalade. Black, with tinted windows and chrome wheels.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: How is it you happen to remember it so clearly?

utterance.speaker: CAL
utterance.content: Because I saw it twice. It passed heading north and he flew by again, maybe ten minutes later.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: They were headed south, off of Long Island. With Castle.

utterance.speaker: TAGGERT
utterance.content: I’ll put out an APB on the Escalade.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I’m going to call state police, have them set up checkpoints at every road heading off of Long Island.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Getting Castle off of the island may not be the plan. The Feds just called. They were able to remotely activate Castle’s phone for a few seconds.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did they get a location?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yep. He’s still on the island. According to his GPS, he was in Medford.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How far is Medford from here?

utterance.speaker: TAGGERT
utterance.content: Not far the way I’m going to drive.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: It says Castle’s GPS puts him about a hundred feet into this junkyard.

utterance.speaker: TAGGERT
utterance.content: State police is ten minutes out. They want you to wait for backup.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Not a chance in hell.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: It’s right over there. 85 feet and closing.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Which way?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Other side of this car carrier, I think. 60 feet now.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There. Black Escalade.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah. That’s ground zero for Castle’s GPS.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So he’s in there?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Stop! Do not move!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Stop!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Freeze!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: On the ground, now!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What have you done? What have you done?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Beckett, we got him.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Beckett, stop.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No! No!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Gary Duffin. You’re no stranger to rooms like this. But this time it’s different. This time, your only option is give me answers.

utterance.speaker: GARY DUFFIN
utterance.content: And what if I don’t?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You were at the junkyard when that SUV came in. Who was in it?

utterance.speaker: GARY
utterance.content: You know what? I want a lawyer.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re a low-level dirtbag, Gary. You’re not a criminal mastermind, so start talking. Who was in the car? Who had you crush it?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Was Castle in the car? Was he in the car? Was he alive?

utterance.speaker: GARY
utterance.content: Ah! You’re going to break my finger.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And then after that there’s nine more, so tell me what I want to know. Start talking.

utterance.speaker: GARY
utterance.content: I’ve got nothing to say.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What? What is it?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Forensics came back on the SUV. There was no blood or tissue. Castle wasn’t inside.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay. So he’s still out there.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Which means they crushed the car to cover their tracks. Okay, get CSU to sweep for DNA and prints. And let’s move Gary Duffin to a holding cell.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So you can do what to him? I was watching. Getting booted of the force is not going to help anything.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Espo, he knows who took Castle.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well, he’s never going to give them up. Whoever they are, he’s way more afraid of them than he is of you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Fine. We’ll try another angle. For now.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Thanks. So, we are dead-ended on the SUV. Ran the VIN number. It turns out that it was stolen from a long term parking lot near JFK with conveniently lousy video surveillance.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay. Let’s dig deeper into our car-crusher, Gary Duffin. Look into his background, his known associates. That might lead us to whoever took Castle.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We’re on it.

utterance.speaker: CAPTAIN VICTORIA GATES
utterance.content: Detective. Do you have a moment?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes, sir.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: How are you holding up?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m fine.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: I truly can’t imagine what you’re going through. How you can focus at a time like this.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Ah, sir, please don’t take me off of this case.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Oh, I won’t. Unless you give me cause to. You keep doing what you’re doing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: And you should know, we’re using every resource that we have to find Mr. Castle. Including calling in the FBI. There’s a Special Agent Connors waiting to speak with you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Sir, with all due respect, I’m under the gun here. I don’t have time to bring the FBI up to speed.

utterance.speaker: SPECIAL AGENT CONNORS
utterance.content: I’m already up to speed, Detective. I just have a few questions.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Kate, they can help.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: I understand investigating this case puts you in a terribly difficult position.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: But I need to talk to you about Mr. Castle. Outside of his family, you’re the one who knew him best.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah well, he didn’t have any problems with gambling, money, drugs - – affairs, so we can skip all of that.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: I understand he was headed to the Hamptons when he was abducted.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. For our wedding.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: Who knew he was making that drive?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The wedding guests. Um … catering staff.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: I’ll need their names.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’ve got a list. But they’re all friends and family.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: Still.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Agent Connors, do you think that this could be a ransom kidnapping?

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: If it is, we’ll be ready. It’s standard protocol to set up a trap and trace in Mr. Castle’s loft. In the event the kidnappers call. We’ll also monitor family cell phones.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You sound like you don’t expect those phones to ring. Agent Connors, do you know something that I don’t?

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: I just keep coming back to how much easier it would have been to grab Castle in the city. Instead they took him on Long Island. Just as he was about to get married. To you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Do you think that this has something to do with me?

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: You and Mr. Castle worked a lot of cases together. Could someone you went after have taken revenge?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. A lot of people.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: Okay. Well, I’ll start by taking a run at Gary Duffin. You go through your case files, come up with a list of potential suspects. Keep me apprised at what you find.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: As long as you do the same.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: He’ll come back.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Of course he will, darling. Your father will be home before you know it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We’ll find him.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So, was Agent Connors able to get anything out of Duffin?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Not a word, so he went back to FBI HQ. Are those the perps you think might have made a move on Castle?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. Starting with Senator Bracken.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: You think Bracken’s behind this?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, we’ve ruined his life and had him sent to prison. Taking Castle down on his way to our wedding would be just like him. Or like 3XK, for that matter, or Mickey Barbossa, or any of the other dozens of people we’ve had put away over the last few years. I mean, it could be any of them. Or none of them.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey. We’re going to figure this out, okay? Kate. Don’t get lost in worst case scenarios. When Alexis was taken, it tied back to Castle’s dad. Maybe he’s mixed up in this and if he is, he’s going to look out for his son.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Except … this is shaping up to be more mob related.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What makes you say that?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I ran Gary Duffin’s cell records. Right before he crushed that SUV he got a call from a Jersey mobster.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: That must be the guy who ordered Gary to squash that car. And why he’s so scared to talk.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who was this mobster?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: One Vincent Cardano.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Vinnie Cardano? I – I’ve met him. Castle knows him.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Was there ever a problem between them?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. There was.

utterance.speaker: VINNY CARDANO
utterance.content: No, there wasn’t, trust me. Things were simpatico with me and Castle. Fact is, it pains my soul that Rick is missing. What can I do to help?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I was there the night that you got angry with him and stormed out.

utterance.speaker: CARDANO
utterance.content: He near accused me of murder. He impugned my integrity. But we made our peace ages ago over a nice bottle of Valpolicella.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Then why did you call Gary Duffin earlier today? Was it to tell him to destroy a certain SUV?

utterance.speaker: CARDANO
utterance.content: What’s a SUV got to do with this?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It was involved in Castle’s abduction.

utterance.speaker: CARDANO
utterance.content: This I did not know.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: But you did have Gary crush that car?

utterance.speaker: CARDANO
utterance.content: We’re entering into a gray area here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re an accessory to kidnapping. There’s nothing gray about that.

utterance.speaker: CARDANO
utterance.content: I’m telling you, Kate. I did not have Rick grabbed!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Then stop playing games and tell me why did you have the car crushed? Vinny, you said that you wanted to help him. This is your chance.

utterance.speaker: CARDANO
utterance.content: Okay, listen. On occasion clients might need to make a vehicle disappear. And for 10 grand such a thing can be handled.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What was the name of the client?

utterance.speaker: CARDANO
utterance.content: No names came up. He called me in the morning, he said the right things, we struck a deal. But I never met the man. It was all anonymous.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Then how did you get paid?

utterance.speaker: CARDANO
utterance.content: We used a drop. The client left a bag full of cash in a dumpster on the Lower East Side. Right after the SUV got turned into a panini.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: After? What happens if you crush the car and then you don’t get your money?

utterance.speaker: CARDANO
utterance.content: That does not happen.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where exactly is this dumpster?

utterance.speaker: TORY ELLIS
utterance.content: Based on what Cardano said, this is the drop point.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Now what are we looking at here? This is not street cam footage.

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: There’s no coverage in the area, but after a rash of break-ins one of the buildings installed hidden cameras and I was able to tap in. This is in the time window when the drop should have taken place.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We get eyes on Cardano’s client, we can get a real lead on who took Castle.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There. Go back.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: That’s him. That’s the client dropping off the cash.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I’ll set up a canvass. Someone had to see where this guy came from or where he went.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wait. Freeze that. Zoom in.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: It can’t be.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It is. That’s Castle. He’s the one who dropped off the cash?

utterance.speaker: TORY
utterance.content: Do you want me to run it again?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I – need to get some air.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah Tory, run it one more time, please.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What are you going to see that you didn’t see before?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Maybe we missed something.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, we missed something. Castle’s in on this. He planned the whole thing.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Maybe it isn’t really him. Just think about it. 3XK, he used a lookalike to try and frame him for murder, a guy with Castle’s face.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, no, Kevin, it wasn’t just his face. It was his clothes, it was his movements, his body. It was him, on his own, just hours after he was supposedly abducted.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Beckett, this doesn’t make any sense. He wouldn’t do that. Not Castle.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Look into Castle, okay? Find out what he did, who he talked to just before he went missing. And um … brief Agent Connors.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What are you going to do now?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m going to talk to his family.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: And these images were taken after the accident, the car fire?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: So he’s alive! He’s not being held captive by God knows who.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Wait, are you saying Dad was run off the road by an SUV and after that he paid to have it crushed?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It looks that way, yeah.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Well that’s ridiculous. Why on Earth would he do such a thing?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Was he going through anything that I didn’t know about?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Like what?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Pressure that he was under. That he kept to himself.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Of course not. Right, Gram?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: No, no, no, no. I would have noticed.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And what about the wedding? Did he have any misgivings?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Misgivings? Katherine, that was the farthest thing from his mind. He couldn’t wait to be married to you.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: You don’t think he’d just walk away, do you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Then what’s going on here?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t know. There’s gotta be another explanation.

utterance.speaker: AGENT CONNORS
utterance.content: I don’t think there is. The video clearly shows Castle out in the world, not under duress. It changes the dynamics of the case.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, this is still a kidnapping. That video could be a fake. All it shows is Castle throwing away a bag. That could have been shot a month ago.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: It wasn’t. Our tech team analyzed the footage. It’s authentic. Were you aware he withdrew a large sum just before he disappeared?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes. It was for our honeymoon.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: Vinny Cardano turned over the ten thousand dollars that was left in the dumpster. It’s the same money that Castle withdrew.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s not possible.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: That’s because you’re locked into your own version of events, but Detective, I can show you those bills. The matching serial numbers.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There’s something else going on. There has to be.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: It all lines up. Right down to the fact that Castle knew Cardano, knew that he could make cars vanish.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So, what? He went through this charade to stage his own disappearance? Why?

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: People are complex. Maybe he had a breakdown. Or a personal crisis. And maybe there’s a secret side to the man that nobody knows. Including you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Look, Agent Connors, I know that there are a lot of unanswered questions here. But you cannot stop looking for him.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: We’ll follow every lead to the end. But once those leads dry up, we have to scale back our investigation.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I will find Castle, with or without the FBI.

utterance.speaker: CONNORS
utterance.content: You’re assuming he wants to be found.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: My name is Detective Kate Beckett, I’m calling from the New York Homicide division … … calling to see if there was any recent activity … … you had a gentleman named Richard Castle check into your hotel within the last … … about six foot two… … take a look at local airlines, gas stations … … traffic cam … … traffic footage in the Hamptons, anything you can get me. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: NEWS REPORTER
utterance.content: … Richard Castle’s mysterious disappearance, FBI agents left the NYPD’s 12th Precinct …

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey Merc, can you put me into the French consulate? … calling from the United States, yes … … yes, je suis… … in regards to a Richard Castle.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, anything coming out of the Hamptons? … … for the past two weeks … … okay, I’ll look for it in my email … … no, I need it right away.

utterance.speaker: COAST GUARD SHIP
utterance.content: This is the United States Coast Guard. Please respond if you are in distress or need assistance.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: He was found adrift 80 miles off the coast of Delaware by a Coast Guard cutter that was out there mapping the currants.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: The Captain recognized who he was and had him airlifted here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What was he doing in the middle of the Atlantic ocean?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, especially in a dinghy with three bullet holes in it.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He was shot?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: The Captain said no, but the doctors here won’t give us any updates on his condition.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where are Martha and Alexis?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: They’re in a patrol car on their way here now.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Kate?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m fine. I just never thought I’d see him again.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle. Hey. It’s me.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Dad?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Richard, darling.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: What’s wrong with him?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Uh huh.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Why hasn’t he regained consciousness?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: We’d like to stay with him, keep him company, if that’s all right.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: LANIE PARISH
utterance.content: Kate! How is he?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He’s stable, but he’s still unconscious.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: So we still don’t know what happened to him?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Well if there’s anything that I can do –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Actually, yeah. I need you to take a look at him.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: You do know living patients aren’t my thing, right?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, Lanie, look. I don’t want you to treat him. I want you to look at him as if it was a case. See if you can find any evidence of where he’s been and what he’s been through.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: I’ll see what I can do.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I’m with Beckett. I never thought that we’d see Castle again.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Still. Where’s he been?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You saw those bullet holes. Maybe he used the boat to escape from whoever abducted him.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: The guy faked his own kidnapping and then ran off. Now how could he do that to Beckett?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: As long as we’ve known him? Worked with him? Don’t you think Castle deserves the benefit of the doubt?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You guys, none of us knows the truth about Castle. Not yet. And Espo, you know what? If you’re wrong, then he was a victim, so instead of us just standing around, waiting for him to wake up, why don’t we start by figuring out who owns that dinghy.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I’m already on it. The boat had expired tags registered to a Curtis Holt of Savannah, Georgia.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We called Holt. He said that he sold it over a year ago at a garage sale. He can’t recall who he sold it to.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay. Check his story. Find the current owner. We find the owner, we’ll find out where Castle was coming from. In the meantime I’ll talk to the ship’s captain and see if he can tell us anything else.

utterance.speaker: CAPTAIN MUNDY
utterance.content: Based on Mr. Castle’s condition, I’m guessing he’d been in that vessel four or five days.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, could the dinghy have come from a larger boat?

utterance.speaker: MUNDY
utterance.content: Not likely. See, it has fenders, or pads to protect the paint. And the position of the fenders points to it being moored at a dock.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Is there any way to know where that dock is?

utterance.speaker: MUNDY
utterance.content: I can give you my best guess. The dinghy had a six horse motor, two hours’ worth of fuel, if the tanks were full. After it ran dry it drifted for four or five days. So based on wind and current vectors it probably launched somewhere between Rhode Island and southern Maine.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It looks like we caught a break. It turns out that sky blue dinghy was a standard white when it came out of the factory.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And how does that help us?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well, the previous owner pimped it out. He added custom fishing rod holders and painted it sky blue.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Making it a relative rarity in the world of dinghies.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So going off what the captain told you, we put out a BOLO on all sky blue dinghies, to all law enforcement along the coast from Rhode Island to Maine.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: We got a hit. A park ranger in Gloucester, Massachusetts recalled seeing it at a private dock.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: This is a satellite photo off the web taken a month ago. This is the private dock that the ranger was talking about.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And there’s a sky blue dinghy.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Complete with custom fishing rod holders, just like the boat Castle was found in.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, so this looks like a mobile home. Does the dock belong to it?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’s all part of the same property. Owned by one Henry Jenkins. Whatever’s going on with Castle, this is where he came from. And this guy must be involved.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thanks for holding down the fort, Sergeant Simms.

utterance.speaker: SERGEANT SIMMS
utterance.content: All I did was hang around and watch a mobile home. What’s this about?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: It’s about the owner, Henry Jenkins. Do you know him?

utterance.speaker: SIMMS
utterance.content: No, we don’t get over here too much. Whoever he is, he’s not home. I didn’t see any signs of life.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, well, we’ll take it over from here.

utterance.speaker: SIMMS
utterance.content: I’m a radio call away if you need me.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: It looks like Henry Jenkins scrubbed himself off the web. All Tory can find out is what we already know. He runs a private security firm in Boston.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We still don’t know what kind of security we’re talking. Mall cops or military contractor?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Either way that would give him access to firearms, which could explain the bullet holes in the boat.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, but what’s the link between him and Castle? Why would he be mixed up with this guy?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s Lanie. She may have something. Stand by.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Kate, I talked Castle’s doctor into letting me look him over, and I came across a few … strange things.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Strange how?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: No trace evidence on Castle’s clothes, but I did find a key sewn into the lining of his pants.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What kind of a key?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: I’m not sure. But it has 38 stamped on it. Does that mean anything to you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Okay. Then there’s his blood work. I found antibodies to dengue fever. That means Castle was exposed to the virus within the last two months.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Wait, isn’t dengue fever tropical?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Yeah. It’s mostly found in Latin America, Africa, and Asia.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That doesn’t make any sense.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Neither does the bullet wound I found. Castle was grazed across the ribs.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh, that makes a little bit more sense. There were bullet holes on the boat.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: But this wound was mainly healed. He was shot a few weeks ago.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: A few weeks ago? Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Maybe even longer. Kate, what the hell was Castle mixed up in?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Beckett! I just saw the curtain move. Someone’s in there.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’ll call you back.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Let’s go.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Did you get eyes on anyone?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Negative.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: On the ground!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Put your hands where I can see them. Now! Now! Now!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What’s in the bags?

utterance.speaker: HENRY JENKINS
utterance.content: Trash! Trash! I was taking out the trash!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Talk to me about Richard Castle.

utterance.speaker: JENKINS
utterance.content: I’m telling you, I don’t know the guy. I mean, I’ve never even heard of him.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: There’s no sign that anyone else has been here.

utterance.speaker: JENKINS
utterance.content: That’s because no one comes here but me. This is my weekend place.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: This is your boat, correct?

utterance.speaker: JENKINS
utterance.content: It would appear to be.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: If you don’t know Mr. Castle then how did he end up in this boat in the middle of the ocean?

utterance.speaker: JENKINS
utterance.content: I have no idea. But I did notice that it was missing when I came up here a few days ago.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So your boat was missing and you didn’t report that?

utterance.speaker: JENKINS
utterance.content: Well, I never use the damn thing. I mean, I don’t even know why I bought it. I just figured it came unmoored or got stolen.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Who would steal a dinghy?

utterance.speaker: JENKINS
utterance.content: Well, there was a man who was hanging around down by the beach.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: A man? Describe him.

utterance.speaker: JENKINS
utterance.content: Um… late 30s, I would guess. Tall, brown hair, big build. Yeah, that’s definitely him.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He was on the beach? What was he doing?

utterance.speaker: JENKINS
utterance.content: Camping.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Camping?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: That can’t be right.

utterance.speaker: JENKINS
utterance.content: He was in a tent. He seemed to be minding his own business and it was on state land, so I just left him alone.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Ryan, would you finish taking Mr. Jenkins' statement?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where exactly was this man?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: That’s the dock where the dinghy was tied up.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: These are Castle’s shoes.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: This is Castle’s watch.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Newspapers, dating back two months. Clothes, supplies … he has everything here. He could have walked up to that trailer and made a phone call. He never did.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Castle’s wedding tux?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle’s awake.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: It’s wonderful news. The doctor just told me Richard will make a full recovery. Oh, I am so relieved. Oh, and I was right there when Richard started to wake up. First thing he did was ask for you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Did he say where he had been?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: We don’t know what he’s been through, so perhaps that question can wait.

utterance.speaker: RICHARD CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Just so you know, the doctor said that kissing will speed my recovery.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Kissing can wait, Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Right. Sorry. I guess I put a little kink in our wedding plans.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Is that supposed to be a joke?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I mean, tell me what happened.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I was on my way to the wedding and this black SUV –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, no. After that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: After the accident?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes, after the accident.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I was here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, before here, Castle. You were found in a boat at sea. A boat that you apparently stole?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What are you talking about? A boat? No, I was in a crash. With a black SUV. And then I woke up here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, tell me what happened in between.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Nothing! I mean, I – I don’t know. I was unconscious.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So the black SUV and waking up here. That’s all you remember?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes, right. Why?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’ve been missing for two months.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What do you think is going on with him?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So is is possible that he underwent trauma and he’s blocking it out?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Maybe his memory will come back once he’s had some time to readjust.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Then what he needs, maybe, is to get back to his life, his routine, the people who love him. Can’t we just take him home?

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Of course, of course. Thank you very much.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Dr. Swann? What do you think is really behind all of this?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: But what?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So you think that he could be pretending not to remember?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: To say I owe you an apology seems an understatement.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I don’t want an apology, Castle. I just want to understand.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You know me, Kate. I wouldn’t just leave.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: There’s evidence. We found the place where you were staying.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: What difference does it make?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Because I want to go there. Maybe it will help me remember. Whatever happens, I need answers. And so do you.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: I don’t get it. How could Castle just leave and go camping?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What happened to giving him the benefit of the doubt?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Beckett asked me to have CSU take a look at the contents of the tent. Javi, you were right. Castle’s fingerprints were all over the newspaper. All that stuff. Hair, DNA. I can’t explain that away. Not this time.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It kind of reminds me of the Hamptons, or Maine, but I’m pretty sure I’ve never been here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, this is it. This is where your tent was.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, none of this looks familiar.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, just tell me the truth. You owe me that much.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I am telling you the truth. I was not here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, your clothes were here. Your watch was here. Your tuxedo. The one that you were going to wear when you married … me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It must have been planted here. You know, along with –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Nothing was planted, Castle. It was you. It was your DNA, your prints.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It must have been a mistake at the lab. There have been numerous cases –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I believed in you. I – I convinced myself that the evidence didn’t matter, that everything that seemed so obvious couldn’t possibly be true. I was searching for you. I didn’t even know if you were alive, or if you were dead, and you were right here, right where you wanted to be.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I promise you. I did not pitch a tent here. I could not have.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I saw it for myself, Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I would not camp in this spot. Not after the research I did on Tropical Storm.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I can’t even do this with you.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey, wait. Listen.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You never wrote a book called Tropical Storm, Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate, wait.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Listen. I started the book. I threw it out. It was … supervillain controls the weather … it was – it was terrible. But the research I did on catastrophic storms stuck with me, leaving me with an irrational but overpowering fear of tsunamis.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You bought a beach house in the Hamptons.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, on the inland side. Not on the ocean side.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate. I would never camp here. I would go for higher ground.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle … there was a witness.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What witness?

utterance.speaker: MAN
utterance.content: Can I help you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah. NYPD. I’m here to see Henry Jenkins.

utterance.speaker: MAN
utterance.content: Well, I’m Henry Jenkins.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m sorry. I was here yesterday and I met a different Henry Jenkins.

utterance.speaker: MAN
utterance.content: What do you mean? I’m Henry Jenkins, and I haven’t been here in months.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We ran prints and passport. He is definitely the real Henry Jenkins.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Which means the first guy was a fake Jenkins. Also a liar.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: But he matched the DMV photo.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s because his photo got switched. When we called the DMV, they realized their system had been hacked two days ago, right after the news broke that I’d been found.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What about all your stuff in the tent?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, it looks like it was all set up in order to create a false trail.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So why don’t you remember anything?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: These people have managed to make it look like I staged my own abduction. They hacked the DMV, they provided a false Jenkins who pointed you to doctored evidence that I’d gone camping. Whoever they are? They have unlimited resources. Maybe the kind of resources that would allow them to alter someone’s memory.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What about the money?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What money?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: We have you on video dropping off ten thousand dollars in a dumpster. After you were taken.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I can’t explain the money. Yet. But I will, and fake Jenkins was part of the setup. So whoever he is, he’s somehow in the middle of this.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Here you go, darling.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Thank you, Mother. And let me just say, in the immortal words of Dorothy, there’s no place like home.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Here’s what I don’t get. Why would someone do this to you, Dad? Where did you actually go for two months?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, those answers lie within the vast, insidious conspiracy behind all of this. The tangled web that I fully intend to untangle.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Enough of that. I’d like to propose a toast. To safe returns.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: And to no more departures.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And to my amazing mother, my wonderful daughter, and the love of my life.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And to coming home.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We’ll find out what happened.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I know. I was just thinking … I feel like I just wore this yesterday. That we slept in this bed last night. But for you it must seem like a lifetime ago.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah, it does.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How did you not lose hope?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I did lose hope, you know. But I – I would get it back. Developed rituals in order to hang on to it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Like what?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s … stupid. It really doesn’t matter.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, I’d like to know.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I would stare at your photo on the murder board. And I started thinking that if I would look at it long enough every day, that that would keep you alive.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I guess it worked.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And then I had this thing about your chair.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: My chair at the precinct?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I wouldn’t let anyone touch it. And the night janitor came by, he tried to move the chair, and I freaked out. I almost shot him.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I am so sorry. For everything that I put you through.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s not your fault, you know, you went through stuff, too, so …

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, it’s not the same. I can’t remember. Though I do know I missed you terribly. Because there’s no way I wouldn’t.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We can’t just, um… pick up where we left off, can we? As if nothing happened.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We’ll get there. We’ll find our way home.
